mapper.select: select organize_id, organize_name, organize_type, create_time, man_count, staff_id, organize_leader, comment from organize_info where organize_id = #{organizeId}
select organize_id, organize_name, organize_type, create_time, man_count, staff_id, organize_leader, comment from organize_info
mapper.insert: insert into organize_info(organize_name, organize_type, create_time, man_count, staff_id, organize_leader, comment) values (#{organizeName}, #{organizeType}, #{createTime}, #{manCount}, #{staffId}, #{organizeLeader}, #{comment})

insert into organize_info(organize_name, organize_type, create_time, man_count, staff_id, organize_leader, comment) values
(#{entity.organizeName}, #{entity.organizeType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.manCount}, #{entity.staffId}, #{entity.organizeLeader}, #{entity.comment})

insert into organize_info(organize_name, organize_type, create_time, man_count, staff_id, organize_leader, comment) values
(#{entity.organizeName}, #{entity.organizeType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.manCount}, #{entity.staffId}, #{entity.organizeLeader}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update organize_name = values(organize_name), organize_type = values(organize_type), create_time = values(create_time), man_count = values(man_count), staff_id = values(staff_id), organize_leader = values(organize_leader), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update organize_info
organize_name = #{organizeName},
organize_type = #{organizeType},
create_time = #{createTime},
man_count = #{manCount},
staff_id = #{staffId},
organize_leader = #{organizeLeader},
comment = #{comment},
where organize_id = #{organizeId}
